programme.title: Live: NFL Countdown
programme.desc: Highlights from previous week's action in the National Football League.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Lamar Jackson and the Ravens (3-5) visit the rejuvenated Vikings (4-4). Jackson returned from a three-game absence to lead Baltimore to a 28-6 victory at Miami in Week 9 for its second straight win. Minnesota stunned Detroit 27-24 in the Motor City.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Lions look to cash in a receipt against the Commanders. Detroit was upset in the 2024 NFC divisional round 45-31 by Washington. Jayden Daniels (WAS) is out indefinitely after dislocating his left elbow in a prime-time loss to Seattle in Week 9.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Chargers play the Steelers on Sunday Night Football. Los Angeles has won three of its last four, but lost left tackle Joe Alt for the year in a Nov. 2 victory at Tennessee. Pittsburgh remains atop the AFC North after stunning Indianapolis 27-20.

programme.desc: The latest scores and highlights, with host Jay Onrait.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing

programme.title: We the North: From Prehistoric to Historic
programme.desc: An exploration of key moments and developments from throughout the Raptors' organization's history; examine "We the North" movement that sparked a diverse community across the country, culminating in the 2019 NBA Championship.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Tiger-Cats seek a hat trick against the Alouettes in the East final. Hamilton won both dates versus Montreal this season, snapping a nine-game slide against the Als that included two playoff losses. Montreal beat Winnipeg 42-33 in the semifinal.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Roughriders face the Lions in the West final. Sean Whyte's field goal as time expired got BC past Calgary 33-30 in the semifinal. Saskatchewan seeks its first Grey Cup berth since 2013, while BC aims for its first trip since hosting in 2011.

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
programme.desc: Ant-Man and the Wasp find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure that pushes them beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young female Marine goes missing as she is about to give birth to her rapist's child; Olivia struggles with painful flashbacks of her sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is found badly beaten in a parking lot, with no memory of what happened, and detectives suspect his transgender teen may be responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young couple is found dead in the back of a padlocked truck, detectives discover the male victim was connected to a Mexican drug cartel.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: DNA evidence points to Benson as the prime suspect when the sexually mutilated body of a member of a biker gang is found in the park; Stabler fights to prove his partner's innocence.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler run into multiple dead ends while investigating the case of a woman who fell to her death wearing only a slip.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After being found unconscious in her hotel bathroom, an Atlanta detective -- in town for a law-enforcement conference -- says that she was raped; Rollins discovers a personal connection to the suspect.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Mornings
programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Aston Villa (4-3-3) look to catch AFC Bournemouth (5-3-2) in the Premier League table. The Villans haven't lost to the Cherries in the last five clashes (3-2-0). Ghanaian forward Antoine Semenyo has six goals for Bournemouth, but none since Oct. 3.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Mornings
programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Premier League titans collide at Etihad Stadium as Manchester City (6-1-3) host Liverpool (6-0-4). The Reds swept both meetings with the Citizens last season by 2-0 margins. Egyptian talisman Mohamed Salah scored in both victories for Liverpool.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Goal Zone
programme.desc: The best moments from the weekend in Premier League action.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sexual assault victim (guest star Tracy Pollan) helps detectives investigate the activities of a rape suspect (guest star Neil Maffin).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler hunts for a missing 14-year-old girl who may have been abducted by a foreign child pornographer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect several young socialites of raping a girl at a Manhattan nightclub, then killing her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Benson gets into the middle of an investigation of her brother, the case begins to threaten her career.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler interview a woman whose 10-year-old daughter is kidnapped from inside the house; they are shocked to hear the family's other daughter disappeared ten years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: FBI Agent Dana Lewis partners with SVU when she thinks a 25-year-old rape-murder case in New York is connected to multiple unsolved cases across the country; as Lewis doggedly pursues her suspect, Benson and Amaro question his guilt.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is abandoned, the squad discovers more victims waiting to be rescued.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a woman claims a charismatic spiritual healer used hypnosis to incapacitate her and assault her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin crosses international borders to catch a fugitive rapist; a political tug-of-war derails Barba's legal case; shocking allegations against Benson lead to the return of an old friend.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cryptic message sends SVU on a new track to find Maddie; Benson tries to help a federal agent when the case hits too close to home; Capt. Curry tries to make amends with Fin.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Agent Sykes struggles to cope on the anniversary of her sister's disappearance; Benson suspects a cold case from Manhattan could help her get closure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler run into multiple dead ends while investigating the case of a woman who fell to her death wearing only a slip.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect several young socialites of raping a girl at a Manhattan nightclub, then killing her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler interview a woman whose 10-year-old daughter is kidnapped from inside the house; they are shocked to hear the family's other daughter disappeared ten years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team must proceed with caution when an underage escort is found dead at a wild bachelor party with high-profile people in attendance; Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters), a former SVU detective who is working under, helps Benson and Amaro investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad reels from the fallout of Capt. Cragen being arrested for the murder of an escort.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into Capt. Cragen and two warring escort services continues; Brian Cassidy's undercover work becomes increasingly difficult; Amaro struggles with the case and his marriage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The special victims squad tries to take down a sex-trafficking operation that enslaves young women; when the investigation is halted by Lt. Alexandra Eames (Kathryn Erbe), Detective Benson has to get creative.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a young boy reminds Cragen, Munch and Benson of an unsolved case from 13 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman claims that the baby she kidnapped is hers with a respected legal expert, the investigation changes the lives of two families.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the detectives investigate reports of sexual abuse at an elite private school, decades of secrets are exposed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man goes on a killing spree, but he has links to a prostitute that Benson encountered in an earlier investigation, so the FBI contacts SVU for information.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives go under cover to arrest a man who brutally attacks other men; a deceptively tough defense attorney (Nia Vardalos) complicates ADA Barba's case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a janitor violently attacks a coach, the SVU team connects the janitor's behavior to a history of sexual abuse; the detectives find more victims of the same predator -- including a prisoner (Mike Tyson) on death row.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A promising singer is beaten by her boyfriend, a famous hip-hop star, but she refuses to help ADA Barba build his case; the defendant and his attorney turn the case into a media circus.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A popular sports reporter (Lauren Cohan) accuses a cameraman (David Marciano) of rape and stalking; when the victim learns she is pregnant as a result of the rape, the defense employs controversial tactics in hope of gaining favor with the jury.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU detectives investigate after a school nurse notices multiple injuries on a young girl; Detective Amaro tries to bond with his recently discovered son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two sniper attacks on the NYPD link to Detective Tutuola's past as a narcotics officer, he reconnects with his former partner in hope of finding a motive; Lt. Alexandra Eames helps SVU investigate.
